name: Franz Wotawa
content: Franz Wotawa [Home] [Up] Dipl.Ing. Dr.techn. FRANZ WOTAWA For my research and publications have a look at my Curriculum Vitae The proceedings of the The 13th International Workshop on Principles of Diagnosis (DX-02) can be found at http://www.dbai.tuwien.ac.at/user/dx2002/. The outcome of the OeGAI prize for the best Austrian master thesis in AI in 2002 can be accessed at http://www.oegai.at/ Position: Univ. Professor / Full Professor Institute: Institute for Software Technology, Graz University of Technology Address: Inffeldgasse 16b, A-8010 Graz, Austria Phone:(++43) (+316) 873 5724 Fax: (++43) (+316) 873 5706 Email: wotawa@ist.tugraz.at My old home page Franz Wotawa 2001-12-19
